text: he logo! daro apane paalanahaar se tatha bhay karo us din ka, jis din nahin kaam aayega koee pita apanee santaan ke aur na koee putr kaam aane vaala hoga, apane pita ke kuchh[1] bhee. nishchay allaah ka vachan saty hai. atah, tumhen kadaapi dhokhe mein na rakhe saansaarik jeevan aur na dhokhe mein rakhe allaah se pravanchak (shaitaan)
